text: antatah, hamane unase badala liya aur unhen saagar mein dubo diya, is kaaran ki unhonne hamaaree aayaton (nishaaniyon) ko jhuthala diya aur unase nishchet ho gaye. unake dhairy rakhane ke kaaran tatha hamane use dhvast kar diya, jo firaun aur usakee jaati kalaakaaree kar rahee thee aur jo belen chhapparon par chadh rahee theen
